src:
King senket United ‚Äì etterp√• tok Solskj√¶r selvkritikk
Bournemouth hadde spilt 358 minutter uten en fulltreffer i ligaen. S√• scoret Joshua King et vidunderlig m√•l mot Manchester United.
02 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Viljam Brodahl

Bournemouth ‚Äì Manchester United 1‚Äì0

Regnet √∏ste ned i S√∏r-England idet Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r og hans Manchester United jaktet p√• sin fjerde strake borteseier p√• bare ti dager.
F√∏r seieren mot Partizan i Beograd 24. oktober gikk laget 11 kamper uten seier p√• fremmed gress. Ikke siden den dramatiske Champions League-seieren mot Paris Saint-Germain i mars hadde United vunnet.
Likevel s√• sa det br√•stopp mot Bournemouth.
Joshua King ble den store helten da han senket laget til gamletreneren etter en kunstscoring.
‚Äì Du √∏nsker √• score i hver kamp, og jeg har spilt litt ute til venstre. Men √• f√• vinnerm√•let var s√• godt. Jeg fokuserte bare p√• m√•let og visste ikke at noen var i n√¶rheten av meg. Jeg brukte tid og traff rent, sier King til BT Sport.


LEST DENNE? To bager kostet fotballforbundet 150.000 kroner: ‚Äì Det er s√•nn det er



Fakta: Joshua King i Premier League
Landslagsspissen har scoret 45 m√•l i Premier League.
Denne sesongen st√•r han med tre m√•l.
Hans beste scoringssesong var i 2016‚Äì2017. Da noterte han seg for 16 m√•l i Premier League.
King har scoret tre m√•l mot gamleklubben Manchester United i ligaen.



Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r s√• bekymret ut p√• benken.üì∑ Mark Kerton / PA

King-show
Like f√∏r pause ble en ball spilt inn mot King i sekstenmeteren. Nordmannen vippet ballen over Aaron Wan-Bissaka p√• mesterlig vis. Avslutningen var det heller ikke noe √• utsette p√•.
‚Äì Solskj√¶rs tidligere elev i Manchester United er den som straffer Solskj√¶r og United i regnv√¶ret p√• s√∏rkysten, utbr√∏t TV 2s kommentator Kasper Wikestad.
‚Äì Det er r√•sterkt. Klasse av Joshua King, la han til.
Den norske landslagsspissen var fra 2008 til 2013 en del av akademiet i Manchester-klubben. Der hadde han blant annet Solskj√¶r som trener.
‚Äì Man m√• kunne si at det var litt magi som avgjorde kampen, sier Solskj√¶r til den britiske TV-kanalen.
Det var Bournemouths f√∏rste m√•l i ligaen p√• nesten √•tte omganger. Klubben hadde g√•tt 358 strake spilleminutter uten scoring. Denne sesongen har King notert seg for tre m√•l.
‚Äì Vi vet at vi kan score. F√∏r var problemet v√•rt √• holde nullen, og vi vet det. Forsvaret var fantastisk i dag. Vi vil alltid komme til √• score m√•l. Vi visste at dersom vi fikk et m√•l, s√• kunne vi vinne, sier King.


LES OGS√Ö: Tre nordmenn sikret seriegull i Sverige etter ellevilt drama




Det var et kraftig regnv√¶r som m√∏tte lagene l√∏rdag ettermiddag.üì∑ DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Kom med sluttspurt
Bortelaget slet med √• skape de virkelig store sjansene, helt til det gjensto ti minutter. Scott McTominay pr√∏vde seg fra distanse, men skuddet ble avverget av hjemmelagets keeper.
Like f√∏r hadde Manchester United hatt nok en stor mulighet. En avslutning fra Mason Greenwood gikk i stolpen.
S√∏rkystklubben hadde ogs√• flere muligheter til √• doble ledelsen, men det ebbet ut i 1‚Äì0 til Bournemouth.
Seieren gj√∏r at Bournemouth passerer Manchester United p√• tabellen. King og co. har 16 poeng, tre flere enn l√∏rdagens motstander.
Solskj√¶r settes under ytterligere press. Etter kampen tok han selvkritikk.
‚Äì Vi manglet kvalitet til tider. Jeg burde kanskje ha startet med noen andre (spillere). Vi m√• vinne slike kamper, vi er skuffet. N√• m√• vi se fremover, sier nordmannen.


LES OGS√Ö: Stor k√•ring: Her er de ti st√∏rste fotballtalentene i Norge




Det ble en frustrerende ettermiddag for Victor Lindel√∂f og resten av Manchester United-spillerne.üì∑ DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Sliter bakover
Det var ogs√• den sjette ligakampen p√• rad at Manchester United ikke klarer √• holde nullen. Spesielt p√• bortebane er det blitt en problem for Solskj√¶rs menn.
Klubben har ikke maktet √• unng√• baklengsm√•l i 11 bortekamper p√• rad i ligaen. Det tangerer klubbens verste rekke siden omleggingen til Premier League i 1992.
Den tidligere rekorden ble satt mellom august 2002 og januar 2003, skriver statistikkleverand√∏ren Gracenote p√• Twitter.
text:
King sunk United - afterwards, Solskj√¶r took self-criticism
Bournemouth had played 358 minutes without a full hit in the league. Then Joshua King scored a wonderful goal against Manchester United.
02 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Viljam Brodahl

Bournemouth - Manchester United 1‚Äì0

The rain was pouring down into southern England as Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r and his Manchester United chased their fourth straight away victory in just ten days.
Before the victory against Partizan in Belgrade on October 24, the team went 11 games without victory on foreign grass. Not since the dramatic Champions League victory against Paris Saint-Germain in March had United won.
Still, it said a sudden stop to Bournemouth.
Joshua King became the big hero when he dropped the team coach to an old coach after an art score.
- You want to score in every game, and I've played a little out to left. But getting the winning goal was so good. I just focused on the goal and didn't know anyone was near me. I spent time and hit clean, King tells BT Sport.


READ THIS? Two bakes cost the football association NOK 150,000: - That's how it is



Facts: Joshua King in the Premier League
The national team has scored 45 goals in the Premier League.
This season he stands with three goals.
His best scoring season was in 2016‚Äì2017. He then scored 16 goals in the Premier League.
King has scored three goals against former Manchester United club in the league.



Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r looked worried on the bench.üì∑ Mark Kerton / PA

King show
Just before the break, a ball was recorded against King in the sixteen meter. The Norwegian flipped the ball over Aaron Wan-Bissaka in a masterful way. The end was nothing to delay either.
- Solsk√¶r's former student in Manchester United is the one who punishes Solsk√¶r and United in the rain on the south coast, commented TV 2's commentator Kasper Wikestad.
- It's strong. Class of Joshua King, he added.
From 2008 to 2013, the Norwegian national team was part of the academy of the Manchester club. There he had, among other things, Solskj√¶r as a trainer.
"You have to say that it was a bit of magic that decided the match," Solsk√¶r told the British TV channel.
It was Bournemouth's first goal in the league in almost eight innings. The club had gone 358 straight minutes without scoring. This season, King has recorded three goals.
- We know we can score. Before, our problem was to keep zero, and we know it. The defense was fantastic today. We will always score goals. We knew that if we got a goal, we could win, ‚Äùsays King.


ALSO READ: Three Norwegians secured gold in Sweden after eleven-game drama




It was a heavy rainstorm that hit the teams Saturday afternoon.üì∑ DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Come with the final question
The away team struggled to create the really big chances, until it remained ten minutes. Scott McTominay did attempt a finish, but from an awkward position, sending the ball into the away fans.
Just before, Manchester United had another great opportunity. Mason Greenwood finishes.
The South Coast club also had several opportunities to double the lead, but it ebbed in 1-0 to Bournemouth.
The victory makes Bournemouth pass Manchester United on the table. King and co. has 16 points, three more than Saturday's opponent.
Sun shades are put under additional pressure. After the fight he took self-criticism.
- We lacked quality at times. Maybe I should have started with someone else (players). We have to win such matches, we are disappointed. Now we have to look ahead, says the Norwegian.


ALSO READ: Big Grading: Here are the ten biggest football talents in Norway




It was a frustrating afternoon for Victor Lindel√∂f and the rest of the Manchester United players. United DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Struggles backwards
It was also the sixth league match in a row that Manchester United failed to keep zero. Especially on the off-track, it has become a problem for Solsk√¶r's men.
The club has not been able to avoid back-to-back goals in 11 away games in a row in the league. It is the club's worst hit since the 1992 Premier League relocation.
The previous record was set between August 2002 and January 2003, writes statistics provider Gracenote on Twitter.
